original_text: The Israelites became very upset because of all the difficult work. They had to build houses with bricks and mortar. They also did many different kinds of work in the fields. The Egyptians made the Israelites do all this difficult work.
korean_text: 어려운 노동으로 그들의 생활을 괴롭게 하니 곧 흙 이기기와 벽돌 굽기와 농사의 여러 가지 일이라 그 시키는 일이 모두 엄하였더라

sentences.original_text: because of all the difficult work
They also did many different kinds of work
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 많은 종류의 일을 했다

sentences.original_text: The Egyptians made the Israelites do
sentences.korean_translation: 이집트 사람들은 이스라엘 사람들이 하도록 만들었다
